name: Captain America's Shield
combatRules: Grants the User one extra level of the power Shield, up to Shield 4.
integrated: The multipliers have been integrated, but bumping 1 level for the Shield power has not been integrated. You'll have to keep track of that on your own.

name: Element Gun
narrativeRules: Can pick elemental effect from air, earth, fire, water, or energy

name: Mjolnir
narrativeRules: Can only be wielded by the worthy.
integrated: The combat rules have been integrated. The narrative rules have not been integrated.
